snippet.title: Sega Ages 2500 Vol. #32 - Phantasy Star Collection - PS2 & JP Psn
snippet.description:
Recently released on PS2(JPN Import), this game contains:

Phantasy Star 1 (Master System/SG-1000/Mark 3 w/Fm sound)
Phantasy Star 2 (Mega Drive/Genesis)
Phantasy Star 3 (Mega Drive/Genesis)
Phantasy Star 4 (Mega Drive/Genesis)
Phantasy Star Gaiden (Game Gear)
Phantasy Star Text Adventure (GG?)
Phantasy Star Text Adventure 2 (GG?)

Phantasy Star 1-4 can be played in English and Japanese while PS Gaiden and Text Adventures 1&2 are Japanese only.

Gameplay shows artwork from PS1 along with a couple cutscenes. PS4 also shown.

The Characters move faster than usual because it's a special setting (Boost 2/4). This is something I wish the original games had (to pick up the pace).

Update 12/28/2012 - The Japanese Psn version of this game is exactly the same.  All you need to do is make a jp psn account.  It's 800 yen. Good luck!
